message: Let's start with a fair split. I'm open to negotiations.
I think I can do better than that. You're getting a bit too rich!
I'm willing to compromise, but I need a bit more. Can we meet in the middle?
You're getting too greedy, Alice. I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of!
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need a bit more. Can we find a compromise?
I'm starting to get impatient. You're not making it easy for me to negotiate. I'm willing to give you a small share, but I need to get most of the money!
I'm not going to give up now. I need a better deal, or I'll walk away with nothing.
